description: Daria slips Innovator delegates a modified review routine for the appeal portal over a drink at Bar 101, ensuring some genuine appeals might get through.
The Citizen Feedback portal goes live, and hopeful citizens rush to submit appeals; some quietly succeed, but most critical posts are subtly filtered.
Encrypted chat channels circulate guides on surviving the new system, as public calm covers a simmering distrust among those whose voices remain unheard.
